list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a religious folk song or popular hymn, particularly one associated with Christmas.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: chúng tôi hát carols bởi nến

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she was cheerfully caroling the words of the song
